segments.text: I need to get my internet fixed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's the problem with your internet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long has this been happening ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This problem has been happening for a few days now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The internet doesn't come up at all ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It just won't connect to a webpage , but it will pop up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's obviously a problem with your connection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to need someone to come and fix it for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can send somebody right now to fix it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will it take for them to get here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They'll be there in about an hour .
segments.speaker: S2
